ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Celery Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Celery Soup
2 (6 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked
2 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles
des: "Tuna tossed with noodles, peas and pimiento in a creamy sauce is baked until bubbling with crunchy crumb topping."
ins:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Mix soup, milk, peas, pimiento, tuna and noodles in 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Mix bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle on top. Bake 5 minutes or until hot.
